The Dutch Bike for Men, Women or Granny Bike is a basic women's bicycle with a 'women's bend' (a straight down tube combined with a single top tube that's bent upwards). 

This model has been around since the 19th century and has regained its popularity in recent years. 

The term Granny Bike stems from the old fashioned image of the bicycle. 

There are many different types of Dutch Bicycles available (with a classic coaster brake, with a hand brake, with or without gears, in various colors) 

At Vintage Cycles you can find a wide choice of Women's Dutch Bicycles by brands like Victoria, Batavus, Gazelle, Cortina and Excelsior etc.

The term Granny Bike stems from the old fashioned image of the bicycle. 

There are many different types of Dutch Bicycles available (with a classic coaster brake, with a hand brake, with or without gears, in various colors)
